summary.span: 代表包含檔案和目錄的隔離儲存區 (Isolated Storage) 之區域。

span.span: Represents an isolated storage area containing files and directories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此物件會對應至特定的隔離儲存區的範圍，檔案會由物件存在。This object corresponds to a specific isolated storage scope, where files represented by objects exist. 應用程式可以使用隔離儲存區來儲存自己單獨的檔案系統中，部分中的資料，而不需要指定檔案系統中的特定路徑。Applications can use isolated storage to save data in their own isolated portion of the file system, without having to specify a particular path within the file system. 隔離存放區都只限於特定組件，因為大多數其他 managed 程式碼將無法存取您的程式碼資料 （高度信任的 managed 程式碼和管理工具可以從其他組件存取存放區）。Since isolated stores are scoped to particular assemblies, most other managed code will not be able to access your code's data (highly trusted managed code and administration tools can access stores from other assemblies). Unmanaged 程式碼可以存取任何隔離儲存區。Unmanaged code can access any isolated stores. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[隔離儲存區](~/docs/standard/io/isolated-storage.md)。For more information, see [Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/isolated-storage.md). 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 應用程式無法使用隔離儲存區。Isolated storage is not available for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 請改用 `Windows.Storage` 應用程式開發介面內含的 [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] 命名空間中的應用程式資料類別來儲存本機資料和檔案。Instead, use the application data classes in the `Windows.Storage` namespaces included in the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/includes/wrt-md.md)] API to store local data and files. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Windows 開發人員中心的 [應用程式資料](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) 。For more information, see [Application data](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=229175) in the Windows Dev Center. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何在隔離存放區中建立檔案和目錄。The following code example illustrates how to create files and directories in an isolated store. 首先，為使用者、 定義域和組件所隔離的存放區會擷取並放置於`isoStore`變數。First, a store that is isolated by user, domain, and assembly is retrieved and placed in the `isoStore` variable. 然後會呼叫方法來建立目錄和兩個執行個體類別建立這些目錄中的檔案。The method is then called to create directories, and two instances of the class create files in these directories. [!code-csharp[Conceptual.IsolatedStorage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.isolatedstorage/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Conceptual.IsolatedStorage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/conceptual.isolatedstorage/vb/source.vb#1)]

span.span: The total number of bytes of storage currently in use within the isolated storage scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代表所有檔案和目錄的隔離儲存區範圍內的總使用方式。Represents the total usage of all files and directories within the isolated storage scope. 參與漫遊使用者設定檔的存放區無法精確地判斷目前的大小。The current size cannot be accurately determined for stores that are participating in a roaming user profile. 漫遊設定檔會經常多部用戶端電腦上快取和更新版本與伺服器同步，因為無法強制執行這類存放區的配額，並不會報告目前的大小。Because roaming profiles are often cached on multiple client machines and later synchronized with a server, quotas cannot be enforced for such stores and the current size is not reported. [How to： 預期隔離儲存區發生空間不足情況](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md)範例示範如何使用屬性。The [How to: Anticipate Out-of-Space Conditions with Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md) example demonstrates the use of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 此範例的完整內容，請參閱概觀。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that was occupying. > [!NOTE] > 務必在您釋放最後一個參考之前呼叫 Dispose 。Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the . 否則，資源是使用之前，將不會釋放記憶體回收集合呼叫物件的方法。Otherwise, the resources the is using will not be freed until garbage collection calls the object's method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會開啟隔離儲存區檔案、 使用它來寫入資料流中的資訊、 關閉檔案，並再使用方法釋放所有資源。The following code example opens an isolated storage file, uses it to write information to a stream, closes the file, and then uses the method to release all resources. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的最後一個項目才必須是萬用字元`searchPattern`。Wildcard characters must only be in the final element of a `searchPattern`. 比方說，「 directory1 / * 等\*"是有效的搜尋字串，但"\*等 \* /目錄 」 不是。For instance, "directory1/*etc\*" is a valid search string, but "\*etc\*/directory" is not. `searchPattern` "Project\Data \*"可讓專案在隔離儲存區範圍內的資料開頭的所有子目錄。The `searchPattern` "Project\Data\*" will give all subdirectories of Project beginning with Data in the isolated storage scope. `searchPattern` "\*"會傳回位於根目錄中的所有目錄。The `searchPattern` "\*" will return all directories located in the root. 字串的搜尋準則的完整說明，請參閱類別。For complete description of search string criteria, see the class. 如需取得檔案名稱的資訊，請參閱方法。For information on getting file names, see the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法時，應用程式相關聯的所有組件會使用相同的隔離儲存區。All assemblies associated with an application use the same isolated store when using this method. 應用程式識別可以判斷-例如，當透過 ClickOnce 部署發行應用程式或 Silverlight 為基礎的應用程式時，才可以使用這個方法。This method can be used only when the application identity can be determined - for example, when the application is published through ClickOnce deployment or is a Silverlight-based application. 如果您嘗試使用 ClickOnce 或 Silverlight 架構應用程式之外，這個方法時，您會收到例外狀況，因為無法判斷呼叫端的應用程式識別。If you attempt to use this method outside a ClickOnce or Silverlight-based application, you will receive an exception, because the application identity of the caller cannot be determined. 在功能上等同於下列程式碼： is functionally equivalent to the following code: [!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#21](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CPP/remarks.cpp#21)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#21](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CS/remarks.cs#21)] [!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#21](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/VB/remarks.vb#21)] 在此程式碼，`applicationIdentity`參數`GetStore(IsolatedStorageScope scope, Object applicationIdentity)`是`null`。In this code, the `applicationIdentity` parameter for `GetStore(IsolatedStorageScope scope, Object applicationIdentity)` is `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相同的組件程式碼會使用不同的隔離存放區使用不同的應用程式的內容中時。The same assembly code will use different isolated stores when used in the context of different applications. 在功能上等同於下列程式碼： is functionally equivalent to the following code: [!code-cpp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#23](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CPP/remarks.cpp#23)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#23](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/CS/remarks.cs#23)] [!code-vb[System.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage#23](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.IsolatedStorage.IsolatedStorage/VB/remarks.vb#23)] 一律執行同一個應用程式定義域中的不同組件具有不同的隔離存放區。Different assemblies running within the same application domain always have distinct isolated stores. > [!NOTE] > 會傳回物件沒有配額，如果在安裝組件的應用程式定義域沒有。 will return an object without a quota if the application domain in which the assembly is installed does not have . 稍後會嘗試建立物件使用物件沒有配額，將會失敗並。Later attempts to create an object using the object that does not have a quota will fail with an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範方法。The following code example demonstrates the method. 此範例的完整內容，請參閱概觀。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可讓應用程式明確要求更大的配額大小，以位元組為單位。The method enables an application to explicitly request a larger quota size in bytes. 新的配額大小不能小於目前的配額大小，因為只有配額增加允許。The new quota size must not be smaller than the current quota size, because only quota increases are allowed. 每當方法是呼叫、 隔離的儲存體呼叫方法。Whenever the method is called, isolated storage calls the method. 您可以藉由建立自訂實作原則決策物件會覆寫方法，讓物件能夠執行原則決策依據物件。You can implement policy decisions by creating a custom object that overrides the method so that the object can perform policy decisions based on a object. 如果找不到自訂物件，配額增加要求遭到拒絕，因為預設實作傳回`false`。If there is no custom object, the quota increase request is denied, because the default implementation for returns `false`. 目前沒有任何.NET Framework 中的主機提供這項自訂，因此一律會傳回`false`。Currently, none of the hosts in the .NET Framework provide this customization, so always returns `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用的位元組數目是由系統管理員所設定的隔離儲存區配額限制。The number of bytes available is constrained by the isolated storage quota set by the administrator. 根據辨識項的安全性原則中設定配額，因此如果執行不同的辨識項使用相同的程式碼可以接收不同的配額。Quota is configured in security policy on the basis of evidence, so the same code can receive a different quota if it is run with different evidence. 例如，在本機執行和接收應用程式也從內部網路上共用會可能不同的配額。For example, an application that is run locally and also from a share on an intranet would likely receive different quotas. [How to： 預期隔離儲存區發生空間不足情況](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md)範例示範如何使用屬性。The [How to: Anticipate Out-of-Space Conditions with Isolated Storage](~/docs/standard/io/how-to-anticipate-out-of-space-conditions-with-isolated-storage.md) example demonstrates the use of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範屬性。The following code example demonstrates the property. 此範例的完整內容，請參閱概觀。For the complete context of this example, see the overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 這個方法無法變更移除整個範圍，其中包含的所有目錄和檔案。This method irrevocably removes the entire scope and all contained directories and files. 如果任何目錄或存放區中的檔案正在使用中，存放區移除嘗試失敗，並在存放區已標示為移除。If any of the directories or files in the store are in use, the removal attempt for the store fails and the store is marked for removal. 修改儲存區的任何後續嘗試擲回。Any subsequent attempts to modify the store throw an . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法，以刪除隔離儲存區檔案之後已清空其內容。The following code example uses the method to delete the isolated storage file after its contents have been emptied.
